<script async type="text/javascript" id="bob_tag_loader">
var page_url = "https:\/\/ktla.com\/news\/nationworld\/in-france-court-rules-amazon-must-stop-selling-nonessential-items-to-protect-workers\/" || "";
var cats = "Nation\/World,News" || "";
var bob_kw = "Amazon,france" || "";
var bob_desc = "Amazon has lost its appeal against a&nbsp;court ruling&nbsp;that prompted it to&nbsp;suspend deliveries in France&nbsp;last week. A court in Paris on Friday upheld a ruling that Amazon must stop selling nonessential goods as it carries out a risk assessment on how best to protect employees from coronavirusin its distribution centers. In a statement, Amazon said it [&hellip;]" || "";
var bob_story_author = "CNN Wire" || "";
var cat_data = "&cats=" + encodeURIComponent(cats) + "&bob_kw=" + encodeURIComponent(bob_kw) + "&bob_desc=" + encodeURIComponent(bob_desc) + "&story_author=" + encodeURIComponent(bob_story_author) + "&page_url=" + encodeURIComponent(page_url);
var bob_base = "bob.dmpxs.com";

var bob_cb = '1';
bob_cb = ((new Date()).getTime() + "" + Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000000)).substr(0, 16);
(function () {
var bob_tag = document.createElement('script');
bob_tag.type = 'text/javascript';
bob_tag.async = true;
bob_tag.id = "bob_tag";
bob_tag.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://' : 'http://') + bob_base + '/static/bob_001.js?bob_cb=' + bob_cb + cat_data;
var bts = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
bts.parentNode.insertBefore(bob_tag, bts);
})();
</script>

					<a
				href="https://ktla.com/news/nationworld/u-s-coronavirus-cases-approach-1-million/"
							>
		
		<div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">

	<img
		src="https://i1.wp.com/ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/04/Getty-NY-crop.jpg?w=2000&#038;ssl=1"

		sizes=""
	/>
</div>

					</div>

					</a>
			</figure>
	</article></div></div></div><div class="dropnav__section dropnav__section--article-list dropnav__section--quarter"><div class="article-list article-list--bulleted"><h3 class="article-list__heading article-list__heading--hidden">Top Stories</h3><div class="article-list__content"><article class="article-list__article">

	</span>
	</div>

</article><article class="article-list__article">
<div
	class="article-list__article-text"
	data-article-list-id=""
	data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text"
	data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb"
	data-current-image-context="[]"
>
			<h4 class="article-list__article-title">
							<a
					href="https://ktla.com/podcasts/coronavirus-daily/ep-28-a-space-explorers-unique-perspective-coronavirus-daily-podcast/"
									>
			
				Ep.28 A space explorer&#8217;s unique perspective | Coronavirus Daily podcast
							</a>
					</h4>
	
	
	
	
			
<span aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1" class="article-list__article-mediaicon">
	<span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-svg">
		<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="15" height="13" viewBox="0 0 15 13"><defs><style>.cls-1{fill:#fff;fill-rule:evenodd}</style></defs><path id="listen_small_carousel_button_default" data-name="listen small carousel button default" class="cls-1" d="M836.992 1121.17a.836.836 0 0 1-.466.76.709.709 0 0 1-.346.08.783.783 0 0 1-.52-.19l-4.463-3.78h-2.37a.818.818 0 0 1-.817-.83l-.01-3.34a.82.82 0 0 1 .811-.84l2.371-.01 4.439-3.82a.786.786 0 0 1 .866-.11.829.829 0 0 1 .47.75l.035 11.33zm4.121-1.32h-.059a.789.789 0 0 1-.576-.24l-.109-.11a.853.853 0 0 1-.082-1.09 4.959 4.959 0 0 0 .922-2.91 4.908 4.908 0 0 0-1.066-3.07.854.854 0 0 1 .052-1.12l.109-.12a.783.783 0 0 1 .615-.24.808.808 0 0 1 .591.3 6.762 6.762 0 0 1 1.479 4.24 6.838 6.838 0 0 1-1.284 4.03.825.825 0 0 1-.592.33z" transform="translate(-828 -1109)"/></svg>	</span>
			<span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-text">Audio</span>
	</span>
	</div>

</article><article class="article-list__article">
<div
	class="article-list__article-text"
	data-article-list-id=""
	data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text"
	data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb"
	data-current-image-context="[]"
>
			<h4 class="article-list__article-title">
							<a
					href="https://ktla.com/podcasts/keepin-it-friel/advocating-for-the-voiceless-with-kiana-dean-keepin-it-friel/"
									>
			
				Advocating for the voiceless with Kiana Dean | Keepin&#8217; It Friel
							</a>
					</h4>
	
	
	
	
			
<span aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1" class="article-list__article-mediaicon">
	<span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-svg">
		<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="15" height="13" viewBox="0 0 15 13"><defs><style>.cls-1{fill:#fff;fill-rule:evenodd}</style></defs><path id="listen_small_carousel_button_default" data-name="listen small carousel button default" class="cls-1" d="M836.992 1121.17a.836.836 0 0 1-.466.76.709.709 0 0 1-.346.08.783.783 0 0 1-.52-.19l-4.463-3.78h-2.37a.818.818 0 0 1-.817-.83l-.01-3.34a.82.82 0 0 1 .811-.84l2.371-.01 4.439-3.82a.786.786 0 0 1 .866-.11.829.829 0 0 1 .47.75l.035 11.33zm4.121-1.32h-.059a.789.789 0 0 1-.576-.24l-.109-.11a.853.853 0 0 1-.082-1.09 4.959 4.959 0 0 0 .922-2.91 4.908 4.908 0 0 0-1.066-3.07.854.854 0 0 1 .052-1.12l.109-.12a.783.783 0 0 1 .615-.24.808.808 0 0 1 .591.3 6.762 6.762 0 0 1 1.479 4.24 6.838 6.838 0 0 1-1.284 4.03.825.825 0 0 1-.592.33z" transform="translate(-828 -1109)"/></svg>	</span>
			<span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-text">Audio</span>
	</span>
	</div>

</article></div></div></div></div></li>

	<aside class="ad-unit ad-unit--leaderboard">
		<div class="ad-unit__content">
			  <div   id="acm-ad-tag-billboard1-billboard1"   data-slot='{"pos":"billboard1","is_companion":true,"is_oop":false,"refresh_on_resize":true,"size":[320,50],"sizes":[[[1280,0],[[728,90],[970,250],[970,90],[970,30]]],[[1024,0],[[728,90],[970,250],[970,90],[970,30]]],[[768,0],[[728,90]]],[[641,0],[[320,50]]],[[0,0],[[320,50]]]],"amp_multi_size":"320x50","lazyload":false,"wx_targeting":[],"module_refreshable":false,"fold":"atf"}'   data-unit='{"tag":"billboard1","tag_id":"billboard1","dfp_id":"5678","tag_name":"nx.ktla","ad_disabled":"0"}'   data-targeting='{"pos":"billboard1","fold":"atf","category":"nationworld","kw":"in-france-court-rules-amazon-must-stop-selling-nonessential-items-to-protect-workers"}'   data-path='/5678/nx.ktla/news/nation/world'  ></div>  <script>  (function () {   try {    var event = new CustomEvent(     "nsDfpSlotRendered",     {      detail: {       id: 'acm-ad-tag-billboard1-billboard1'      }     }    );     window.dispatchEvent(event);   } catch (err) {}  })();  </script>  		</div>

	<div class="site-content__layout site-content__layout--has-sidebar">
		
		
		
		<div id="primary" class="content-area">
			<main id="main" class="site-main">

				
<article class="article post-1005538 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-nationworld category-news tag-amazon tag-france" data-component="article">
	
<header class="article-header">
	<h1 class="article-title">
		In France, Amazon loses court appeal and must stop selling nonessential items to protect workers	</h1>

			<div class="article-eyebrow">
			<a href="https://ktla.com/news/nationworld/">Nation/World</a>
		</div>
	
	
	<div class="article-meta">
					<p>by: <a href="https://ktla.com/author/cnn-wire/" title="Posts by CNN Wire" class="author url fn" rel="author">CNN Wire</a></p>
		
					Posted: <time datetime="2020-04-24T07:41:11-07:00">Apr 24, 2020 / 07:41 AM PDT</time>		
					<span class="article-meta--sep"> / </span>Updated: <time datetime="2020-04-24T07:44:51-07:00">Apr 24, 2020 / 07:44 AM PDT</time>			</div><!-- .article-meta -->

	
	<div class="article-lead-share">
		
<div class="social-share addthis">
	<div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox" data-url="https://ktla.com/news/nationworld/in-france-court-rules-amazon-must-stop-selling-nonessential-items-to-protect-workers/"></div>
</div>
	</div>
</header><!-- .article-header -->

	
	<div class="article-content rich-text">
		
		
<p>Amazon has lost its appeal against a&nbsp;<a href="https://edition.cnn.com/2020/04/14/europe/amazon-france-penalty-coronavirus-deliveries-intl/index.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">court ruling</a>&nbsp;that prompted it to&nbsp;<a href="https://edition.cnn.com/2020/04/15/tech/amazon-france-suspension/index.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">suspend deliveries in France</a>&nbsp;last week.</p>



<p>A court in Paris on Friday upheld a ruling that Amazon must stop selling nonessential goods as it carries out a risk assessment on how best to protect employees from coronavirusin its distribution centers.</p>



<p>In a statement, Amazon said it was assessing the court&#8217;s decision but had no comment on whether it would reopen its warehouses.</p>



<p>The company shut down its French distribution centers in the wake of the original ruling, citing the stiff&nbsp;penalties threatened by the court and the &#8220;complexity inherent in our logistic activities.&#8221; Amazon&#8217;s top executive in France said that it wasn&#8217;t clear which products were considered essential.</p>



<p>Amazon said at the time that it was suspending activities &#8220;despite the huge investment that we have made to ensure and strengthen by additional measures the safety of our employees who remained mobilized during this crisis.&#8221;</p>



<p>The initial ruling followed a complaint by a French labor union, which accused&nbsp;<a href="http://edition.cnn.com/2020/04/09/tech/amazon-dominance-coronavirus/index.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">the online delivery giant</a>&nbsp;of endangering the lives of workers by not instituting enough safety precautions to protect against the virus.</p>



<p>Under the terms of the order, Amazon would be limited to selling goods classified as electronics, office equipment, animal care products, home improvement items, health and body care products, and groceries.</p>



<p>Each shipment of anunauthorized product could incur a penalty of up to â‚¬100,000 ($108,000), the court ruled.</p>



<p>Amazon has faced criticism in the United States overÂ <a rel="noreferrer noopener" href="https://edition.cnn.com/2020/04/02/tech/amazon-coronavirus-safety-measures/index.html" target="_blank">the health and safety of workers</a>Â as it facesÂ <a rel="noreferrer noopener" href="http://edition.cnn.com/2020/04/13/tech/amazon-hiring-coronavirus/index.html" target="_blank">increasing demands</a>Â on its services during the pandemic. Last week, the company said<a rel="noreferrer noopener" href="https://edition.cnn.com/2020/04/07/tech/amazon-social-distancing-enforcement/index.html" target="_blank">Â it may begin firing employeesÂ </a>who &#8220;intentionally violate&#8221; its social distancing guidelines, despite complaints from workers who say the demands of their job make it impossible to comply with the policy.</p>

		

		<div class="article-content-cta-group">
			<div class="modal modal--suggest-a-correction article-content-cta-group__cta" data-component="modal">
	<div class="modal__dialog" style="display: none;">
		<div class="modal__dialog-content">
			<button class="modal__close-button" aria-label="Close Modal Content">
				<span class="icon">
<svg aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 16.85 16.875">
	<title>Close Modal</title>
	<path fill="#fff" d="M9.65 8.454l6.88-7.063a.809.809 0 0 0 0-1.15.782.782 0 0 0-1.14 0L8.52 7.305 1.37.241a.782.782 0 0 0-1.14 0 .809.809 0 0 0 0 1.15l7.15 7.063-7.15 7.063a.809.809 0 0 0 0 1.15.824.824 0 0 0 .6.219.787.787 0 0 0 .59-.219l7.15-7.063 6.87 7.063a.824.824 0 0 0 .6.219.619.619 0 0 0 .54-.219.792.792 0 0 0 0-1.15z" />
</svg>
</span>
			</button>
							<h3 class="modal__dialog-title">Suggest a Correction</h3>
						<div id='contact-form-1005538'>
<form action='https://ktla.com/news/nationworld/in-france-court-rules-amazon-must-stop-selling-nonessential-items-to-protect-workers/#contact-form-1005538' method='post' class='contact-form commentsblock'>

	</div>

	</div>

				
<div class='grunion-field-wrap grunion-field-textarea-wrap'>

<textarea name='g1005538-reportatypoorgrammaticalerror' rows='20' class='textarea' required></textarea>
	</div>

				<input type="hidden" name="suggest_a_correction" value="1" />
			 	<p class='contact-submit'>
		<button type='submit' class='pushbutton-wide'>Submit</button>		<input type='hidden' name='contact-form-id' value='1005538' />
		<input type='hidden' name='action' value='grunion-contact-form' />
		<input type='hidden' name='contact-form-hash' value='8d8e7e9c382f2093c1085a2af2a79b5fe3b59d60' />
	</p>
</form>
</div>		</div>
	</div>
	<button data-modal-trigger>Suggest a Correction</button>
</div>

	</div><!-- .rich-text -->

	<aside class="article-list article-list--full-width">
		
	<h2 class="article-list__heading article-list__heading--notched">
		More Nation/World Stories	</h2>


<div class="article-list__content">
						<a class="article-list__blanketing-link" href="https://ktla.com/news/nationworld/u-s-coronavirus-cases-approach-1-million/">
		
		<article
			class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--has-excerpt"
			data-index="0"
			data-collection="article-list1"
			data-anvato-params="null"
		>
			
<div
	class="article-list__article-text"
	data-article-list-id="article-list1"
	data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text"
	data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile"
	data-current-image-context="[&quot;16:9&quot;,&quot;(max-width: 899px) 100%, (max-width: 1023px) 75vw, 884px&quot;]"
>
			<h3 class="article-list__article-title">
			
				U.S. coronavirus cases approach 1 million
					</h3>
	
			<footer class="article-list__article-byline">
			by CNN Wire <span class="sep">/</span> <time datetime="2020-04-27T04:00:47-07:00">Apr 27, 2020</time>		</footer>
	
			<div class="article-list__article-excerpt article-list__article-excerpt--is-faded rich-text">
			<p>A new week in the&nbsp;coronavirus pandemic&nbsp;is beginning with a United States case count approaching 1 million and several cities and states preparing to loosen stay-at-home restrictions.</p>
<p>There have been&nbsp;54,883 coronavirus deaths&nbsp;reported nationally and more than 965,000 cases of the virus in the US.</p>
		</div>
	
			<div class="article-list__read-more article-list__read-more--w-arrow">
							<span>
					Read the Full Article
											<span class="icon icon--arrow">
	<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 17.938 10.94">
		<path d="M17.944 5.55a.733.733 0 0 1-.032.34v.03c0 .01-.006.01-.008.01a.189.189 0 0 1-.028.05.619.619 0 0 1-.123.17c-.009.01-.013.02-.023.03l-4.927 4.56a.733.733 0 0 1-.5.19.753.753 0 0 1-.54-.23.737.737 0 0 1 .041-1.04l3.547-3.28H.738a.735.735 0 1 1 0-1.47h14.693l-3.74-3.68a.735.735 0 0 1 1.03-1.05l5.022 4.94s0 .01.008.01a.016.016 0 0 0 .017.01.8.8 0 0 1 .163.32c.007.03.009.06.013.09z"/>
	</svg>
</span>
									</span>
					</div>
	
	</div>

	<figure class="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile">
		
		<div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
			
<div class="image-wrapper landscape">
	<img
		src="https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/04/Getty-NY-crop.jpg?w=1920&#038;h=1080&#038;crop=1"
		alt="Medical workers take in patients at a special coronavirus intake area at Maimonides Medical Center in the Borough Park section of Brooklyn which has seen an upsurge of coronavirus patients on April 03, 2020 in New York City (Spencer Platt/Getty Images)"
		srcset="https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/04/Getty-NY-crop.jpg?w=320&amp;h=180&amp;crop=1 320w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/04/Getty-NY-crop.jpg?w=640&amp;h=360&amp;crop=1 640w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/04/Getty-NY-crop.jpg?w=960&amp;h=540&amp;crop=1 960w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/04/Getty-NY-crop.jpg?w=1280&amp;h=720&amp;crop=1 1280w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/04/Getty-NY-crop.jpg?w=1920&amp;h=1080&amp;crop=1 1920w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/04/Getty-NY-crop.jpg?w=1920&amp;h=1080&amp;crop=1 2560w"
		sizes="(max-width: 899px) 100%, (max-width: 1023px) 75vw, 884px"
	/>
</div>

					</div>

			</figure>
			</article>

					</a>
								<a class="article-list__blanketing-link" href="https://ktla.com/news/nationworld/new-york-hospitals-study-common-heartburn-drug-as-treatment-for-covid-19/">
		
		<article
			class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--has-excerpt"
			data-index="1"
			data-collection="article-list1"
			data-anvato-params="null"
		>
			
<div
	class="article-list__article-text"
	data-article-list-id="article-list1"
	data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text"
	data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile"
	data-current-image-context="[&quot;16:9&quot;,&quot;(max-width: 899px) 100%, (max-width: 1023px) 75vw, 884px&quot;]"
>
			<h3 class="article-list__article-title">
			
				New York hospitals study common heartburn drug as treatment for COVID-19
					</h3>
	
			<footer class="article-list__article-byline">
			by CNN Wire <span class="sep">/</span> <time datetime="2020-04-27T03:47:55-07:00">Apr 27, 2020</time>		</footer>
	
			<div class="article-list__article-excerpt article-list__article-excerpt--is-faded rich-text">
			<p>Hospitals in New York are giving&nbsp;Covid-19&nbsp;patients heartburn medicine to see if it helps fight the virus, according to the doctor who initiated the trial.</p>
<p>Preliminary results of the clinical trial of&nbsp;famotidine, the active ingredient in Pepcid, could come out in the next few weeks, said Dr. Kevin Tracey, president of Feinstein Institutes for Medical Research at Northwell Health, which runs 23 hospitals in the New York City area.</p>
		</div>
	
			<div class="article-list__read-more article-list__read-more--w-arrow">
							<span>
					Read the Full Article
											<span class="icon icon--arrow">
	<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 17.938 10.94">
		<path d="M17.944 5.55a.733.733 0 0 1-.032.34v.03c0 .01-.006.01-.008.01a.189.189 0 0 1-.028.05.619.619 0 0 1-.123.17c-.009.01-.013.02-.023.03l-4.927 4.56a.733.733 0 0 1-.5.19.753.753 0 0 1-.54-.23.737.737 0 0 1 .041-1.04l3.547-3.28H.738a.735.735 0 1 1 0-1.47h14.693l-3.74-3.68a.735.735 0 0 1 1.03-1.05l5.022 4.94s0 .01.008.01a.016.016 0 0 0 .017.01.8.8 0 0 1 .163.32c.007.03.009.06.013.09z"/>
	</svg>
</span>
									</span>
					</div>
	
	</div>

	<figure class="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile">
		
		<div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
			
<div class="image-wrapper landscape">
	<img
		src="https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/02/outbreak-coronavirus-world-1024x506px.jpg?w=1920&#038;h=1080&#038;crop=1"
		alt="A rendering of the 2019-nCoV strain of coronavirus is seen in an image released by the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention."
		srcset="https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/02/outbreak-coronavirus-world-1024x506px.jpg?w=320&amp;h=180&amp;crop=1 320w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/02/outbreak-coronavirus-world-1024x506px.jpg?w=640&amp;h=360&amp;crop=1 640w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/02/outbreak-coronavirus-world-1024x506px.jpg?w=960&amp;h=540&amp;crop=1 960w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/02/outbreak-coronavirus-world-1024x506px.jpg?w=1280&amp;h=720&amp;crop=1 1280w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/02/outbreak-coronavirus-world-1024x506px.jpg?w=1920&amp;h=1080&amp;crop=1 1920w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/02/outbreak-coronavirus-world-1024x506px.jpg?w=1920&amp;h=1080&amp;crop=1 2560w"
		sizes="(max-width: 899px) 100%, (max-width: 1023px) 75vw, 884px"
	/>
</div>

					</div>

			</figure>
			</article>

					</a>
								<a class="article-list__blanketing-link" href="https://ktla.com/news/nationworld/house-democrats-investigate-u-s-sales-of-unproven-coronavirus-antibody-tests-call-for-fda-action/">
		
		<article
			class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--has-excerpt"
			data-index="2"
			data-collection="article-list1"
			data-anvato-params="null"
		>
			
<div
	class="article-list__article-text"
	data-article-list-id="article-list1"
	data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text"
	data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile"
	data-current-image-context="[&quot;16:9&quot;,&quot;(max-width: 899px) 100%, (max-width: 1023px) 75vw, 884px&quot;]"
>
			<h3 class="article-list__article-title">
			
				House Democrats investigate U.S. sales of unproven coronavirus antibody tests, call for FDA action
					</h3>
	
			<footer class="article-list__article-meta">
			<time datetime="2020-04-26T14:58:36-07:00">Apr 26, 2020</time>		</footer>
	
			<div class="article-list__article-excerpt article-list__article-excerpt--is-faded rich-text">
			<p>House Democrats are citing flaws in federal policy that have led to unproven and fraudulently marketed&nbsp;coronavirus&nbsp;antibody tests being sold in the United States, according to a memo shared exclusively with CNN.</p>
<p>The memo, by the House Oversight Subcommittee on Economic and Consumer Policy, says that after a briefing last week by federal officials the subcommittee has found the Food and Drug Administration is "unable to validate the accuracy of antibody tests that are already on the market." The committee chairman is suggesting the FDA shut the marketplace down until better procedures are in place.</p>
		</div>
	
			<div class="article-list__read-more article-list__read-more--w-arrow">
							<span>
					Read the Full Article
											<span class="icon icon--arrow">
	<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 17.938 10.94">
		<path d="M17.944 5.55a.733.733 0 0 1-.032.34v.03c0 .01-.006.01-.008.01a.189.189 0 0 1-.028.05.619.619 0 0 1-.123.17c-.009.01-.013.02-.023.03l-4.927 4.56a.733.733 0 0 1-.5.19.753.753 0 0 1-.54-.23.737.737 0 0 1 .041-1.04l3.547-3.28H.738a.735.735 0 1 1 0-1.47h14.693l-3.74-3.68a.735.735 0 0 1 1.03-1.05l5.022 4.94s0 .01.008.01a.016.016 0 0 0 .017.01.8.8 0 0 1 .163.32c.007.03.009.06.013.09z"/>
	</svg>
</span>
									</span>
					</div>
	
	</div>

	<figure class="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile">
		
		<div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
			
<div class="image-wrapper landscape">
	<img
		src="https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/04/GettyImages-1210838140.jpg?w=2560&#038;h=1440&#038;crop=1"

		srcset="https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/04/GettyImages-1210838140.jpg?w=320&amp;h=180&amp;crop=1 320w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/04/GettyImages-1210838140.jpg?w=640&amp;h=360&amp;crop=1 640w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/04/GettyImages-1210838140.jpg?w=960&amp;h=540&amp;crop=1 960w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/04/GettyImages-1210838140.jpg?w=1280&amp;h=720&amp;crop=1 1280w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/04/GettyImages-1210838140.jpg?w=1920&amp;h=1080&amp;crop=1 1920w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/04/GettyImages-1210838140.jpg?w=2560&amp;h=1440&amp;crop=1 2560w"

	/>

		<article
			class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type"
			data-index="4"
			data-collection="article-list2"
			data-anvato-params="null"
		>
			
<div
	class="article-list__article-text"
	data-article-list-id="article-list2"
	data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text"
	data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb"
	data-current-image-context="[&quot;16:9&quot;,&quot;(max-width: 899px) 100%, (max-width: 1023px) 75vw, 884px&quot;]"
>
			<h3 class="article-list__article-title">
							<a
					href="https://ktla.com/news/community-nation-honor-lakewood-wwii-vet-on-105th-birthday/"
									>
			
				Community, nation honor Lakewood WWII vet on 105th birthday
							</a>
					</h3>
	
	
	
	
	</div>

	<figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
					<a
				href="https://ktla.com/news/community-nation-honor-lakewood-wwii-vet-on-105th-birthday/"
							>
		
		<div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">

	<img
		src="https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/04/Vet-2.jpg?w=1920&#038;h=1080&#038;crop=1"

	<span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-svg">

		</article>

			<aside class="ad-unit ad-unit--leaderboard">
			<div class="ad-unit__content">
				  <div   id="acm-ad-tag-leaderboard3-leaderboard3"   data-slot='{"pos":"leaderboard3","is_companion":true,"is_oop":false,"refresh_on_resize":true,"size":[320,50],"sizes":[[[1280,0],[[728,90]]],[[1024,0],[[728,90]]],[[768,0],[[728,90]]],[[641,0],[[320,50]]],[[0,0],[[320,50]]]],"amp_multi_size":"320x50","lazyload":false,"wx_targeting":[],"module_refreshable":false,"fold":"btf"}'   data-unit='{"tag":"leaderboard3","tag_id":"leaderboard3","dfp_id":"5678","tag_name":"nx.ktla","ad_disabled":"0"}'   data-targeting='{"pos":"leaderboard3","fold":"btf","category":"nationworld","kw":"in-france-court-rules-amazon-must-stop-selling-nonessential-items-to-protect-workers"}'   data-path='/5678/nx.ktla/news/nation/world'  ></div>  <script>  (function () {   try {    var event = new CustomEvent(     "nsDfpSlotRendered",     {      detail: {       id: 'acm-ad-tag-leaderboard3-leaderboard3'      }     }    );     window.dispatchEvent(event);   } catch (err) {}  })();  </script>  			</div>
		</aside>
	
	
</div><!-- #content -->
		</div>

<script type='text/javascript'>
(function() {
	var _sf_async_config = window._sf_async_config = (window._sf_async_config || {});

	_sf_async_config.sections = "Nation\/World";
	_sf_async_config.authors = "CNN Wire";
	function loadChartbeat() {
			var e = document.createElement('script');
			var n = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
			e.type = 'text/javascript';
			e.async = true;
			e.src = '//static.chartbeat.com/js/chartbeat.js';
			n.parentNode.insertBefore(e, n);
	}
	loadChartbeat();
})();
</script>

</script>

	// Static Queue Snippet

		!function(t,n){t[n]=t[n]||{nlsQ:function(e,o,c,r,s,i){return s=t.document,r=s.createElement("script"),r.async=1,r.src=("http:"===t.location.protocol?"http:":"https:")+"//cdn-gl.imrworldwide.com/conf/"+e+".js#name="+o+"&ns="+n,i=s.getElementsByTagName("script")[0],i.parentNode.insertBefore(r,i),t[n][o]=t[n][o]||{g:c||{},ggPM:function(e,c,r,s,i){(t[n][o].q=t[n][o].q||[]).push([e,c,r,s,i])}},t[n][o]}}}(window,"NOLBUNDLE");
	
	// SDK Initialization
